wikipedia_page.main: Sir Richard Radford Best,  (28 July 1933 – 7 March 2014) was a senior British diplomat. He served as Ambassador to Iceland from 1989 to 1991.

response: * Richard Radford Best, , lately Deputy British High Commissioner, Kaduna.
